review_data.title: Home Delivery
review_data.content: Wienerschnitzel via Mosis bestellt und es war unglaublich! Eines der besten Schnitzel! Kann ich nur empfehlen!!!!

review_data.title: The perfect lunch ....
review_data.content: Didn't plan to go here for lunch, which turned out as a positive surprise. The food was definitely freshly prepared and delicious. Service was friendly and overall pricing reasonable .... would come again.

review_data.title: Nachtessen
review_data.content: Heute mit der ganzen Familie. Sonst mit Freunden und Kollegen. Ein Genuss. Service und essen einfach genial.

review_data.title: Where the place once was - hole in the ground
review_data.content: This billardhall, gamesroom + Restaurant had been taken down just recently there will be an appartment complex in place, a shame it was a place plenty of good food and fun, it fell victim to greed.

review_data.title: Delicious food at a reasonable price ( for switzerland)
